reviews.review_msg: I entered the class with a lot of surrounding hype about Jody through friends and online sources. To be honest, he's alright. He rambles a lot and has a tough time explaining the fundaments of theories (doesn't make things clear). I appreciate his efforts, but his organization skills are kinda subpar and the ads felt a bit tacky.

Professor Jody Baker is very informed and brilliant about the subject he is teaching. He is also funny and engaging. However, the problem with his lecturing is that he complains a lot about his personal life a lot and needs to learn to keep those information private.

Jody is an awesome prof! Hes clear, interesting and funny. Watched a lot of hilarious ads in class. No midterms and no textbook! Grading is fair and clear. I have never enjoyed a communications class as much as I have enjoyed this one. Would definitely take a class with him again
